name: NAMKA'S NIGHTMARE (lorenartemar)
description:
WELCOME TO YOUR INFINITE NIGHTMARE

Namka's Nightmare is a collection of various mini games in an enthralling automatic runner style!

Step into the boots of Hiro and prepare yourself to face the myriad of dangerous Namkas, waiting to drive you straight to madness!

Face the various obstacles and enemies on every level  using your incredible jump skills or picking up valuable and varied perks spread along the map.

And don't forget to  collect as many coins as possible to  pay off your debt with Namka or buy even more mini-games!

 

 Special thanks to the artists who have allowed me to use their wonderful art:

Hiro's character art: https://blairclaw.itch.io/

Namka's character art: https://thomas-lean.itch.io/

Environmental art: https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/
